retrieve_calendar_events.success_prompt: Summarize appointments and simplify them without IDs.

add_calendar_event.init_prompt: Appointments can only be added if no other appointment exists in the requested time period.
add_calendar_event.success_prompt: Confirm the successful addition of the appointment.

move_calendar_event.init_prompt: Appointments can only be moved if no other appointment exists in the target time period.
move_calendar_event.success_prompt: Confirm the successful moving of the appointment.

delete_calendar_event.init_prompt: Only delete appointments if this is clearly requested in the query.
delete_calendar_event.success_prompt: Confirm the successful deletion of the appointment.
